entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-08-17
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • Bundle-Migration errors with "cannot access file...being used by another process" #25555
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations
  • dotnet ef dbcontext optimize as a PreBuild task #25553
    customer-reported
  • [Cosmos] How to set a partition key in a embedded entity? #25548
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-cosmos, Backlog
  • RevEng: Avoid redundant code in many to many #25547
    type-enhancement, area-test, area-scaffolding, Backlog

Closed

  • RevEng: Error when table selection contains a table name with quotes #25289
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-scaffolding, 6.0.0
  • Two instances get created with QueryTrackingBehavior = NoTracking #25400
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-query, 6.0.0
  • How to avoid exeption "Unable to translate collection subquery..." when writing query with group by #24886
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported, area-query
  • Operation on Entities without code dublication #25551
    closed-question, customer-reported
  • Allow TypeMappingSource to use the pre-convention configuration #25084
    type-enhancement, closed-fixed, area-type-mapping, 6.0.0
  • EF Core 5 Grouping subquery under join throws exception #25461
    closed-duplicate, customer-reported
  • 5.0.9 release notes says there are no changes, but there are #25549
    type-bug, closed-fixed, area-docs, customer-reported, 6.0.0

Updated

  • [Cosmos] Objects sometimes corrupted and mutated in memory on DbContext.Set<T>().Add call #25560
    customer-reported
  • Query: Deal with same querycontext parameter having multiple inferred type mapping #19503
    type-bug, needs-design, area-query
  • When using DbContextOptionsBuilder.UseModel with a singleton Instance, EF crashes when trying to initialize the model in multiple threads #25205
    type-bug, closed-fixed, customer-reported, area-model-building, 6.0.0
  • Cosmos: Add translators for member/methods which map to built-in functions #16143
    type-enhancement, good first issue, area-query, area-cosmos, community-contribution, 6.0.0
  • Scaffold tool can create an inverse property with a similar name to a column property and get confused #25292
    type-bug, customer-reported, waiting-for-response, area-scaffolding, 6.0.0
  • InMemory database throwing NullReferenceException when using a nullable value-converted property in a query #25492
    type-bug, customer-reported
  • Exception when creating SQLite DB in when targetting osx-arm64 / .Net 6 (preview) #24198
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-adonet-sqlite, 6.0.0
  • AsSplitQuery sporadically missing navigation properties #25556
    customer-reported
  • Multiple solution file confusion issue #21655
    type-enhancement, customer-reported, area-tools, punted-for-6.0, Backlog
  • Bundle-Migration errors with "cannot access file...being used by another process" #25555
    type-bug, customer-reported, area-migrations

PullRequests

Created

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x

Merged

  • RevEng: SqlServer: Escape table name passed from user correctly #25558
    auto-merge
  • Query: Run shaper only when needed in SplitQueryingEnumerable #25557
    auto-merge
  • Add scalar type configuration support to compiled models. #25540
    auto-merge
  • Migrations Bundles: Fix some bugs #25554
  • Add translation for DateTime.UtcNow #25545
  • Query: Add a test for group by constant composed #25552
    auto-merge
  • Allow HasDefaultValue where value is assignable to property #25539
  • Register concrete DbContext type in D.I. even when registration for interface is also made #25537
  • Support mapping identity columns to enum properties #25536
  • Make the non-thread-safety of DbContext more visible #25516
  • Log provider version in addition to EF Core version #25515
  • RevEng: Scaffold Many-To-Many join table #25544
  • Query: Add support for GroupBy patterns beyond aggregate #25495
    providers-beware, breaking-change, auto-merge
  • Cosmos FromSql #25525
    auto-merge

Updated

  • Update branding to 7.0.0-alpha1 #25561
  • Make compiled model and runtime initialization thread-safe #25559
  • [release/3.1] Update SQLite dependencies to 2.0.4 #25550
    Servicing-consider, 3.1.x
